amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to be used to implement, administer, or enforce the Davis-Bacon Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in House Report 115-259 to ensure that no funds are used to implement, administer, or enforce the Davis-Bacon Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 249 (Roll no. 419).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 249 (Roll no. 419).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. King (IA).
